item.title: S.S Lazio Is One Of The Best Clubs In European Football
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.6 ✓ dplyr 1.0.8 ## ✓ tidyr 1.2.0 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 2.1.2 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(worldfootballR) library(gt) library(cowplot) The last time Lazio won the title in Serie A was in 2000. Since then, the club has always been a solid top 10 squad in Italy.

item.title: About Nolan Hemmett
item.description: Welcome to my page. This is a really cool sport’s blog.
